body_html: Hi, I am new to deep learning and pytorch. I try to build pytorch (branch: new_version) on windows with openblas and cpu version only. May i know how to solve the following syntax problem when running "python setup.py install" command.
body_text: Hi, I am new to deep learning and pytorch. I try to build pytorch (branch: new_version) on windows with openblas and cpu version only. May i know how to solve the following syntax problem when running "python setup.py install" command.
body:
Hi, I am new to deep learning and pytorch. I try to build pytorch (branch: new_version) on windows with openblas and cpu version only. May i know how to solve the following syntax problem when running "python setup.py install" command. 
![syntax error](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30174905/31313062-76ab7a06-ac09-11e7-9dbb-847045647be9.PNG)
